parameters.name: seeds

param_schema.title: Seeds
param_schema.description: Random seed, separated with '|' to use different seeds for each of the prompt provided above. Leave blank to randomize the seed.

parameters.description: Random seed, separated with '|' to use different seeds for each of the prompt provided above. Leave blank to randomize the seed.

parameters.name: prompts
parameters.default: a cat | a dog | a horse

param_schema.title: Prompts
param_schema.default: a cat | a dog | a horse
param_schema.description: Input prompts, separate each prompt with '|'.

parameters.description: Input prompts, separate each prompt with '|'.

parameters.name: num_steps

param_schema.title: Num Steps
param_schema.description: Steps for generating the interpolation video. Recommended to set to 3 or 5 for testing, then up it to 60-200 for better results.

parameters.description: Steps for generating the interpolation video. Recommended to set to 3 or 5 for testing, then up it to 60-200 for better results.

parameters.name: num_inference_steps

param_schema.title: Num Inference Steps
param_schema.description: Number of denoising steps for each image generated from the prompt
